item.title: Importing journal entries from Perl journal
item.description: ##23:06 Saturday 08 November 2014 JST## I’ve spent a few hours today processing my old school journal entries for inclusion in my hakyll journal. I have been doing it all in emacs, with some macros to speed up the process (of processing them). The first macro redacts email address domains from comments: (fset 'rn-00-redact-emails-in-comments [?\C-s ?c ?o ?m ?m ?e ?n ?t return return ?\C-s ?@ return ?\C-k ? ?* ?
